description: a(n) = n-th number k >= 2 such that if 1 < j < k then fractional part of log k < fractional part of log j.
prog: (PARI) lista(n) = {last = frac(log(2));for (k=2, n, new = frac(log(k)); if (new < last, print1 (k, ", "); last = new;););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 21 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
